info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued May 15 at 8:24PM AST until May 16 at 6:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected due to breaking waves between 6 to 8 feet. * WHERE...North-central beaches of Puerto Rico and eastern beaches of Culebra and Saint Croix. * WHEN...Through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
